dcterms:creator: Raul Fervari
Andreas Herzig
Yanjun Li
Yanjing Wang
dcterms:description: The logic of goal-directed knowing how proposed in this dataset extends the standard epistemic logic with an operator of knowing how, interpreted as the existence of a strategy that ensures the agent knows how to achieve a goal.
dcterms:title: Logic of Strategically Knowing How

dcterms:creator: Yanjun Li
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a tableau-based decision procedure for the logic of knowing how via simple plans, providing a method to decide the satisfiability of this logic.
dcterms:title: Knowing How via Simple Plans

dcterms:creator: Yanjing Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset introduces a logic of knowing how, formalizing the concept of knowing how in modal languages with a new modality.
dcterms:title: A Logic of Knowing How

dcterms:creator: Yanjing Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a logic of goal-directed knowing how, focusing on the relationship between goals and the knowledge of how to achieve them.
dcterms:title: A Logic of Goal-Directed Knowing How

dcterms:creator: Chao Xu
Yanjing Wang
Thomas Studer
dcterms:description: This dataset explores a logic of knowing why, formalizing the concept of knowing why in a logical framework.
dcterms:title: Knowing Why
